mng: to think, to believe, to suppose, to wish, to want, to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

exm.mng: to want to, to feel like, to fancy, to care for sb, desirous of
to have a think about it, recall...
an ideal, a dream, ideal, perfect
to miss sb, to very much want to
to think of, to call to mind, to anticipate
to imagine, to conceive of, to visualize, imagination
way of thinking, opinion, notion, to think of a way (to do sth)
